name: Velocity Racing
description:
Velocity Racing is a 2D  game singleplayer and multiplayer developed by Stonrx games and released on 16/2/2021 . Game contain Racing and Action . The game has only an online minigame named Race, in them must to race with players and win. Singeplayer contain 10 levels.

PC Controls:

  • WD - Moving
  • Escape - Pause Game
  • Mouse - Select options
  • Alt+Enter - Toggle fullscreen
  • Reset button - Reset all level

These are the Velocity Racing  system requirements (minimum)

  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GT 430
  • CPU: Intel Pentium dual Core
  • DirectX: Version 9.1
  • Game File Size: 410 MB
  • OS: Windows 7

These are the Velocity Racing  system requirements (recommended)

  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710
  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo T7250
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Game File Size: 410 MB
  • OS: Windows 10
